Summary: Noticed red ball of light moving through the tree line, snaped multiple photos included best shot with enhancment and original photo
divs: Sighting DetailsOn the night of august 24th 2006, from my porch while smoking a cigarette i noticed a moving red ball of light aprox. 5 miles WNW of my location moving through the tree line in an elliptic pattern. unsure of what i was looking at, I ran in to grab my Nikon 7300 7 megapixel digital camera and shot a sequence of 4 pictures, i used the night landscape setting so the flash would not go off and placed it on my tripod. The first 3 photos taken i zoomed in at the 10x optical zoom and could not distinguish what i was seeing from the background photons collected, however when i used the 500x digital zoom i was able to snap a great shot of a disc shaped object with symmetrical designs on the exterior of the object. my wife and i observed the object for around an hour before calling it a night and going to bed. Then next day i used my photoshop elements 4.0 program to adjust the levels and attempt to brighten up the pictures a little to see if there was anything i missed, as the original seems to just be all black with only a small indication of anything in the lower left hand corner. to my astonishment when i used the autofix, feature on the photo the image enclosed is what was revealed, a very convincing UFO picture. I have enclosed the original and the adjusted levels picture for your to analyze to see that the original is actually the picture i took with my camera, and only after the adjustments were made was i able to make out any sort of shape of the object.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Grants Pass
There were no other sightings in Grants Pass on or around August 24th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
